heading: ‍100,000 Steps – Diablo 4 Barbarian Unique Item
content: 100,000 Steps are Barbarian Unique Boots. They give you a free every 30 seconds when using . Like all Unique items they provide a powerful effect that can't be found on any other item. These effects can't be moved around like resulting in limited flexibility when incorporating them into your build. Many Unique items change the way skills and builds work in significant ways. More info coming soon!
